oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Survival of Colletotrichum acutatum on alternative hosts
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Parikka, Päivi
Lemmetty, Anne
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
To detect possibilities for weeds to transfer the pathogen from infected plants to a second crop, the susceptibility of some alternate hosts was studied.
Altogether 18 annual and perennial weed species common on strawberry fields were inoculated in greenhouse with spore suspension of C. acutatum.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Parikka, Päivi and Lemmetty, Anne (2009) Survival of Colletotrichum acutatum on alternative hosts. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 5 (9), NJF Report, p. 17.
